publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3554 Johann Lamont: Running Out of Time - Support for Elderly Carers—That the Parliament welcomes the Running Out of Time campaign, launched by ENABLE Scotland to highlight the needs of older carers of people with learning disabilities; recognises the huge pressure on these carers and the fears that they have about what will happen to their children when they, their carers, die or are no longer able to care; supports ENABLE’s call for action by local authorities and the Scottish Government to identify elderly carers, and urges the Scottish Government to meet the key demands of the Running Out of Time campaign for better support now for older carers and help for them to plan for the future and put something in place for their sons or daughters so that older carers can have peace of mind. *S3M-3553 John Wilson: Excellent Chryston Primary School HMIe Report—That the Parliament congratulates Chryston Primary School for achieving an excellent evaluation in the recent HM Inspectorate of Education report in which the encouraging work of both staff and children is recognised and the commitment to maintaining current standards is celebrated; notes the success of recent events in expanding the learning experiences of children, and highlights the improvements in service that continue to be in line with the Curriculum for Excellence. Supported by: Sandra White*, Jamie Hepburn*, Bill Kidd*

S3M-3554 Johann Lamont: Running Out of Time - Support for Elderly Carers—That the Parliament welcomes the Running Out of Time campaign, launched by ENABLE Scotland to highlight the needs of older carers of people with learning disabilities; recognises the huge pressure on these carers and the fears that they have about what will happen to their children when they, their carers, die or are no longer able to care; supports ENABLE’s call for action by local authorities and the Scottish Government to identify elderly carers, and urges the Scottish Government to meet the key demands of the Running Out of Time campaign for better support now for older carers and help for them to plan for the future and put something in place for their sons or daughters so that older carers can have peace of mind.

S3M-3554 Running Out of Time - Support for Elderly Carers (lodged on 26 February 2009) Sarah Boyack*, David Whitton*, James Kelly*, David Stewart*, Mary Mulligan*, Ross Finnie*, Elaine Murray*, Patricia Ferguson*, Jackie Baillie*, Cathy Jamieson*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Sandra White*
S3M-3554 Running Out of Time - Support for Elderly Carers (lodged on 26 February 2009) Robin Harper*, Ken Macintosh*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Bill Butler*, Cathie Craigie*
S3M-3554 Running Out of Time - Support for Elderly Carers (lodged on 26 February 2009) Marilyn Livingstone*, Pauline McNeill*, Trish Godman*, Rhoda Grant*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-3554 Running Out of Time - Support for Elderly Carers (lodged on 26 February 2009) Karen Whitefield*
S3M-3554 Running Out of Time - Support for Elderly Carers (lodged on 26 February 2009) Tom McCabe*
